Dayda

City of New York

This is a catalog of datasets organized and made more accessible from the City of New York, providing simple dowloadable CSV and JSON files, as well as Postman Collections you can use as part of workflows and other automation.


Home

About

Tags

Feed

APIs.json

    DYCD after-school programs Beacon Programs

    Facilities in New York City, by agency and site, that offer “Beacon Programs” after-school programs. Update Schedule: Annually

    DYCD after-school programs Beacon Satellite At NYCHA Programs

    Facilities in New York City, by agency and site, that offer “Beacon Satellite at NYCHA Programs” after-school programs.

    DYCD after-school programs Adolescent Literacy

    Facilities in New York City, by agency and site, that offer after-school programs and learning resources for adolescent literacy.
